programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Thick, chewy chocolate cookies and spiced molasses cookies are classics. Watch as we discover which types of chocolate and molasses make these favorites great again.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Lemon meringue pie is a three-part recipe—crust, lemon filling, and meringue—and each one can be a challenge. We discover which rolling pins are best and whether you can use store-bought pie crust in a pinch. Then we perfect the filling and meringue.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more American than strawberry shortcake? But sometimes this classic summer fare can go terribly wrong. When it comes to cherry cobbler, sour cherries are a must. But where do you get sour cherries? Are jarred cherries a worthy alternative?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Who can resist a chocolate cake? We wanted cakes that would be great tasting and easy to prepare, and we came up with two: old-fashioned, moist, and homey; the other elegant, dense, and ethereal.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A true New York-style cheesecake should be pure and minimalist but also have just the right color, flavor, and density. With a crisp graham cracker crust and a filling that fades from creamy to cake-like, our cheesecake is worthy of any diner in New York.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to create flavorful, fresh-tasting versions of Greek and spinach salads.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's the best way to enjoy summer tomatoes? While it's hard to argue with sliced, salted tomatoes, there are times when you want to use tomatoes in more elaborate dishes, and gazpacho and a cheesy tart are two of our favorites.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Chili is probably America's favorite one-pot supper and we wanted to create a great, simple version. And while no one thinks of a clambake as a one-pot wonder, we set out to make an indoor version simple enough to prepare even on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We go to the test kitchen to show how to make the perfect clam chowder and delicious crab cakes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Watch as we figure out the best recipes for two New Orleans favorites—Jambalaya and bananas Foster.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Tomatoes and pasta are a classic (and delicious) pairing, but sometimes you want a change. Vegetable sauces, like the two featured in this episode—one with mushrooms and one with broccoli rabe—are appealing options.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some pasta dishes take considerable time to prepare. But others don't have to. We set out to streamline Bolognese and baked four-cheese pasta to make them weeknight dining.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When it comes out right, pot roast is tender, succulent, and richly flavored. Good pot roast begins at the market, and we've found that cooking technique matters just as much as the cut.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pork producers have worked so hard to remove fat from their pigs that most pork roasts have little character. Glazing a pork roast with maple syrup is an attractive way to boost flavor and we wanted to perfect this recipe.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Truckers often know where to find the best home-style cooking. And what could be better than chicken-fried steak with cream gravy and real coconut cream pie?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Although chicken dinners are quick to prepare, they can go terribly wrong. Part of the problem is the chicken itself—the breast meat has little fat and becomes dry and chalky if overcooked. The other major source of trouble is improper cooking methods.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: French country cooking has a way with chicken in a pot, whether it's the famous chicken with 40 cloves of garlic or the lesser-known chicken Provençal. These dishes take chicken to new heights—or go awry.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Purchase a good steak and cook it properly, and all it needs is salt and pepper—and, of course, a side of spuds. We wanted potatoes with perfect texture and big flavor—something unusual to accompany a great steak and a good bottle of wine.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Restaurant steak tips are often tough and weirdly seasoned, and thick steak fries can be pale and soggy. The test kitchen felt confident that we could rescue these dishes and turn them into something you would welcome into your home.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to prepare two satisfying stir-fries: beef with broccoli and pork with eggplant and onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make Pad Thai and Sesame Noodles with Shredded Chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Here we demonstrate how to make three Italian classics: Grilled Chicken ala Diavola, Frico, and Strawberries with Balsamic Vinegar.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Preparing favorite French dishes such as cassoulet or tarte Tatin calls for a lot of patience and time. We wondered if we could find ways to simplify these recipes without sacrificing the qualities that make them classics.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In the test kitchen, we think afternoon (or morning) tea is an excellent excuse to whip up a batch of scones or a golden loaf of lemon pound cake. Making these baked goods at home certainly yields better results than what you can buy. We'll show you how.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some days you don't mind spending the morning preparing eggs or baking muffins. But rubbery omelets and dry, hockey puck muffins can make you wonder why you bothered. These brunch recipes are special enough to make you long for Sunday mornings.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Few recipes deliver so much pleasure for so little work as pancakes. The batter comes together in minutes, and the cooking time is brief. Why, then, do most Americans never make pancakes from scratch?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Although easy to prepare, most cookie recipes are notoriously fickle. A minor ingredient change or fluctuation in oven temperature can yield unexpected results. Our goal was simple: Take two favorite cookies and develop reliable recipes that taste great.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fin del juego
programme.desc: Con la ayuda del equipo, Vance se enfrenta a sus demonios mientras descubre una compleja relación con un asesino que pone en peligro a toda su familia.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Apagón
programme.desc: El equipo se encuentra literalmente a oscuras cuando la investigación sobre la muerte de un teniente se relaciona con un apagón en toda la ciudad.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Juego de niños
programme.desc: El trabajo diurno de un marine muerto en un laboratorio de ideas del gobierno lleva a Gibbs y al equipo a la vida de un niño prodigio de 12 años que puede ser el próximo objetivo del asesino.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Reglas no escritas
programme.desc: Cuando un robo a mano armada termina con la muerte de un oficial, Frank busca justicia. Pero las tensiones aumentan en la casa de los Reagan cuando Erin retira los cargos al sospechoso por falta de evidencia.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La ciudad que nunca duerme
programme.desc: Cuando el famoso actor Russell Berke, quien siguió a Danny para investigar su próximo papel, es apuñalado, Danny lo ayuda, pero debe mantener el crimen en secreto debido al estatus de celebridad de Russell.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Proteger y servir
programme.desc: Danny negocia con un hombre que mantiene a Erin como rehén en la corte. Mientras, Frank decide el castigo para Jamie, quien desobedeció órdenes y fue suspendido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que está desfigurando víctimas a propósito. Además, Rossi tiene un encuentro incómodo con su exesposa, Hayden Montgomery, quien mantuvo a su hija, Joy, en secreto durante casi 30 años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando los guardias de la prisión en Virginia interceptan un paquete de pruebas relacionadas con el secuestro de dos niños hace varios años, la UAC interroga a un famoso asesino serial que puede tener información sobre el paradero de los niños.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Diane proposes marriage to Sam in order to save her mom's inheritance.

programme.desc: Sam is chagrined when his brother captivates everyone at Cheers, especially Diane, whose budding romance with the dashing Derek sparks Sam's jealously and confusion.

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The arrival of Diane Chambers in Seattle puts Frasier on an emotional roller coaster ride.

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: Alfie, el seductor irresistible

programme.title: De Prada a la nada
programme.desc: Nora y Mary son hermanas mimadas que viven la buena vida en Beverly Hills hasta que su amoroso padre muere inesperadamente.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: El citadino Ren MacCormack se muda a un pequeño pueblo donde el rock and roll y el baile están prohibidos. Su espíritu rebelde sacude a la población.

programme.title: Todo sucede en Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Una fábula optimista y jocosa que aborda los temas de la vida y la muerte de una forma sorpresiva y emocionante. Es sobre la trayectoria inesperada que toma la vida de un joven y la mujer que lo ayuda a ver con otros ojos el mundo que lo rodea.

programme.title: Como si fuera cierto
programme.desc: David Abbott, un arquitecto solitario, encuentra un increíble apartamento en San Francisco, solo para descubrir que está embrujado por el espíritu del inquilino anterior, Elizabeth Masterson, una doctora superdotada que está en coma.

programme.title: Cosas que diría con solo mirarla
programme.desc: Una historia compuesta de cinco tramas entrelazadas que se centran en un grupo de mujeres cuyas vidas, en el transcurso de unos pocos días, se enredan, se erosionan, se enriquecen y, finalmente, terminan por cambiar para siempre.

programme.title: La chica de rosa
programme.desc: Ella es una chica de la secundaria del lado equivocado de la ciudad. Él es el galán rico que la invita al baile de graduación. Pero con la misma velocidad que crece su romance, crece la amenaza de la dolorosa presión de los amigos.

programme.title: Amor a ritmo de go go
programme.desc: Dos muchachos llegan a la gran ciudad con la intención de conquistarla. En una discoteca Go-Go conocen a Lupe y ahí comienza la acción y la clásica música de Rock & Roll.

programme.title: Amorcito Corazón
programme.desc: Rosita, una dama de ciudad, finge un embarazo para complacer a su esposo y calmar sus celos antes de que él se marche al campo. Todo se complica cuando regresa y ella debe presentarle a su “primogénito”.

programme.title: Aquí Está Tu Enamorado
programme.desc: Antonio es un apuesto "Don Juan" al que le encantan las mujeres, pero huye del matrimonio como del diablo. Todo se complicará cuando pretende a la novia del comisiario y la llegada de un "paquete" misterioso.

programme.title: Música y Dinero
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de empleados amenaza con hacer huelga, el jefe le pide a un amigo cantante que ha recibido una herencia que lo ayude con su problema.

programme.title: Nobleza ranchera
programme.desc: Don Fernando regresa de la capital con sus dos hijas. Pronto se desatará una tragedia en su propio rancho, cuando ellas se disputen el amor de Luis.

programme.title: Pancho López
programme.desc: Un hombre es enviado a vender el ganado de un tío, pierde todo el dinero en el juego e inventa que fue asaltado.

programme.title: Papá en onda
programme.desc: Ricardo es un hombre de negocios cuyos tres hijos adolescentes viven con su esposa. Esta comedia se centra en las dinámicas familiares entre Ricardo y sus hijos, así como su relación con su amigo Julio, un soltero que viva la vida al máximo.

programme.title: Pecado de juventud
programme.desc: Una sirvienta embarazada del joven de la casa donde trabaja es despedida de su trabajo y un vecino abogado le ofrece su ayuda para hacer que el joven se comprometa con ella, o al menos darle una ayuda para criar a su hijo.

programme.title: Destrucción
programme.desc: Una detective de policía reconecta con gente relacionada con una misión encubierta de hace años para encontrar paz.

programme.title: Un plan sencillo
programme.desc: Dos hermanos encuentran cuatro millones de dólares en una avioneta caída e intentan quedarse con el dinero, pero la paranoia, la codicia y el miedo a ser capturado hacen que su plan esté fuera de control, con consecuencias desastrosas.

programme.title: Solo Dios perdona
programme.desc: Only God Forgives reúne la visión del célebre director Nicolas Winding Refn (DRIVE) con Ryan Gosling en un thriller de suspenso ambientado en los sórdidos bajos fondos de Bangkok.

programme.title: Jade
programme.desc: Corelli está hasta el cuello en un caso que puede conducirlo donde no quiere ir. Chazz Palminteri interpreta a Matt, abogado y amigo de Corelli. Linda Fiorentino es la esposa de Matt, Trina; una psicóloga capaz de todo incluso de asesinar.

programme.title: Transpecos (LAS)
programme.desc: For three US Border Patrol agents, the contents of one car reveals a dark secret within their unit that could cost them all their lives. SXSW Grand Jury Award Winner 2016

programme.title: El esposo incorrecto
programme.desc: Melanie nota que su marido está actuando diferente cuando se revela que en realidad es su gemelo idéntico.

programme.title: Número De Suerte

programme.title: La caza del Octubre Rojo
programme.desc: Un submarino nuclear ruso con tecnología superior se dirige a la costa de los EE.UU.; sin embargo, un analista de la CIA cree que el capitán va a desertar, y tiene apenas unas horas para probarlo.

programme.title: Corazón valiente
programme.desc: Corazón valiente, la detallada y feroz saga de combate, amor tierno y la voluntad de arriesgarlo todo por la libertad. Película de Mel Gibson, ganadora del Premio de la Academia®. En una actuación cargada de emociones.

programme.title: Las cuatro plumas
programme.desc: Harry Feversham es un soldado con gran futuro hasta que renuncia a su regimiento. Es tachado de cobarde, repudiado por su familia, su prometida y su mejor amigo. Tras saber que su regimiento ha sido atacado, se embarca en una travesía de redención.

programme.title: La conquista del honor
programme.desc: Del director ganador del premio de la Academia Clint Eastwood y del ganador del premio de la Academia Steven Spielberg, llega la historia de los seis hombres que izaron la bandera en la Batalla de Iwo Jima, un punto de inflexión en la Segunda Guerra.

programme.title: Ocho hombres
programme.desc: Una dramatización sobre el infame Escándalo de los Medias Negras de 1919, en el que ocho miembros de los Chicago White Sox conspiraron con apostadores para entregar la Serie Mundial a cambio de dinero.

programme.title: La caza del Octubre Rojo
programme.desc: Un submarino nuclear ruso con tecnología superior se dirige a la costa de los EE.UU.; sin embargo, un analista de la CIA cree que el capitán va a desertar, y tiene apenas unas horas para probarlo.

programme.title: La gran fuga
programme.desc: Un mafioso atrapa a dos ladrones de autos mientras le roban y les da una semana para conseguirle un Ferrari clásico. Si no, podrían perderlo todo.

programme.title: Redención
programme.desc: Jason Statham interpreta a un cobrador que trabaja para un jefe de la mafia local en este thriller de acción de alto octanaje. Afectado por el asesinato de un amigo y consumido por deseos de venganza, se sumerge en un mundo de violencia.

programme.title: Resultado final
programme.desc: Después de que terroristas mortales secuestran a su sobrina en un partido de fútbol, un ex soldado con habilidades de combate letales (Dave Bautista) libra una guerra de un solo hombre para salvarla y evitar la destrucción masiva.

programme.title: Caza Terrorista
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage enciende un barril de pólvora de acción mientras un veterano agente de la CIA va a la caza de su némesis, un terrorista mortal.

programme.title: Edad de hielo
programme.desc: Terremotos masivos abren la placa tectónica árabe, lo que produce temperaturas bajo cero que serán mortales al anochecer.

programme.desc: Esta secuela veloz y llena de acción de "El cuervo" sigue el ascenso de la víctima de asesinato Ashe Corven, que regresa a la vida gracias a un misterioso cuervo. Con la ayuda de una mujer llamada Sarah, se venga de sus asesinos uno por uno.

programme.title: El pacificador
programme.desc: Cuando un tren que transporta ojivas nucleares se estrella en la Unión Soviética, la especialista nuclear Dra. Kelly descubre que el accidente es en realidad parte de un complot para cubrir el robo de las armas.

programme.title: Hotel para perros
programme.desc: Un adolescente huérfano que aloja en secreto a perros perdidos en un hotel abandonado. Basado en la novela de Lois Duncan.

programme.title: El hijo de Rambow
programme.desc: Una historia fresca sobre la amistad, la familia, los héroes cinematográficos y la riesgosa aventura de crecer en la era del video.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket una serie de eventos desafortunados
programme.desc: Una emocionante desventura con tres ingeniosos huérfanos y un villano actor llamado Conde Olaf (Jim Carrey) quien busca quitarles su enorme fortuna.

programme.title: Hotel para perros
programme.desc: Un adolescente huérfano que aloja en secreto a perros perdidos en un hotel abandonado. Basado en la novela de Lois Duncan.

programme.desc: Una historia fresca sobre la amistad, la familia, los héroes cinematográficos y la riesgosa aventura de crecer en la era del video.

programme.title: Capturen a Quigley
programme.desc: El francotirador Matthew Quigley (Tom Selleck) cree que ha sido contratado para matar perros salvajes en Australia, pero un rico ganadero (Alan Rickman) tiene otros planes para el francotirador. Laura San Giacomo coprotagoniza este elegante western.

programme.title: Aventuras en Dinotopia
programme.desc: David Scott y su hermano Karl se encuentran en la aventura de su vida cuando se encuentran atrapados en Dinotopia.

programme.title: Euroviaje
programme.desc: Europa nunca será la misma después de que Scotty Thomas y sus amigos aterrizan para vivir aventuras y excesos, haciendo las cosas más alocadas en el viaje más salvaje de sus vidas!

programme.title: A Toda Madre: A Toda Madre
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand y Seth Rogen son el dúo cómico perfecto al embarcarse en un gran viaje. Cuando Andy invita a su madre a un viaje de 8 días y 4800 kilómetros por el país, cuanto más lejos viajan, más cercanos se vuelven.

programme.title: Viaje censurado
programme.desc: Cuatro amigos emprenden un viaje de 3000 kilómetros para recuperar un video ilícito enviado por error a una amiga.

programme.title: Euroviaje
programme.desc: Europa nunca será la misma después de que Scotty Thomas y sus amigos aterrizan para vivir aventuras y excesos, haciendo las cosas más alocadas en el viaje más salvaje de sus vidas!

programme.title: Pelea de chicas
programme.desc: Cuando Anna Wyncomb conoce un club de lucha clandestino exclusivamente femenino para cambiar el caos de su vida, descubre que está mucho más conectada personalmente con la historia del club de lo que jamás podría imaginar.

programme.title: Un par de seductores
programme.desc: Dos estafadores rivales hacen una apuesta: ganará el primero que estafe cincuenta mil dólares a la próxima mujer que conozca, y el otro se irá de la ciudad. Hay mucho en juego en esta comedia divertida, ingeniosa, sucia y podrida.

programme.title: Estrenando cuerpo
programme.desc: El cómico en aprietos Lance Barton sabe cómo es morir en escena. Pero cuando su vida toma un giro inesperado, directo al cielo, Lance está seguro de que ha habido un error.

programme.title: El robo del siglo
programme.desc: Basada en hechos reales, un grupo de ladrones realizó el que se considera uno de los robos bancarios más famosos e inteligentes de la historia de Argentina al robar la sucursal del Banco Río en Acassuso.

programme.title: Fuera del cielo
programme.desc: El drama de 24 horas comienza a las 6 de la mañana con el joven Cucú, cuyo hermano Malboro lo recibe después de una separación de cinco años. Una vez reunidos, planean un robo que los lleva a una serie de encuentros con diferentes personas.

programme.title: ¿Quieres ser mi hijo?
programme.desc: Una mujer de 40 años le pide a su vecino de 23 años, a quien detesta, que finja ser su hijo, durante un viaje de fin de semana para obtener un trabajo que le ayudará a regresar a la vida que perdió.

programme.title: Recién cazado
programme.desc: Sebastián es un destacado enólogo que lleva una vida desordenada y una mañana, al despertar de una parranda, descubre que contrajo matrimonio la noche anterior con Alexa. A partir de ese momento buscará anular el compromiso.

programme.title: Mientras Duermes
programme.desc: Un portero trastornado que tiene la manía de atormentar a sus residentes decide intimidar a la vecina más alegre y arruinarle la vida a toda costa.

programme.title: La boda de Valentina
programme.desc: Valentina tiene la vida perfecta en Estados Unidos. Su universo tiembla cuando su novio Jason le propone matrimonio y debe enfrentar a su familia, “los perfectos Tate”, con la suya, “los Hidalgo”, la dinastía política más caótica de la historia de México.

programme.title: Casese Quien Pueda
programme.desc: The best-laid love plans go hilariously awry in this romantic-comedy hit about two sisters (Martha and Miriam Higareda) who find themselves in uncharted romantic territory.

programme.title: El bebé de Rosemary
programme.desc: La historia de una joven pareja que espera su primer bebé. Como casi todas las primerizas, Rosemary se siente confundida. Su marido, un actor ambicioso pero sin éxito, hace un pacto con el diablo que promete llevar su carrera a la fama.

programme.title: Sospechoso cero
programme.desc: Un agente del FBI que investiga la muerte de un asesino serial sigue la pista de un justiciero que dedica su vida a perseguir asesinos seriales.

programme.title: El lobo de snow hollow
programme.desc: El sheriff de un pueblo pequeño y su apático equipo de oficiales deben resolver una serie de asesinatos que ocurren en la luna llena. Mientras es consumido por la búsqueda del asesino, lucha por recordarse a sí mismo que los hombres lobo no existen...

programme.title: El bebé de Rosemary
programme.desc: La historia de una joven pareja que espera su primer bebé. Como casi todas las primerizas, Rosemary se siente confundida. Su marido, un actor ambicioso pero sin éxito, hace un pacto con el diablo que promete llevar su carrera a la fama.

programme.title: Freeway
programme.desc: Intentando huir de su vida, la delincuente juvenil adolescente Vanessa Lutz se va a vivir con su abuela. En su camino, conoce a Bob Wolverton, un asesino en serie encantador pero sádico.

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't
programme.desc: A fast-shooting gunman and an insurance agent track down the murdering robbers of a train hijacking and the stolen money.

programme.title: Boot Hill
programme.desc: Spaghetti western with Terrence Hill, Bud Spencer and black actor Woody Strode. Victims of oppressive town boss Honey are offered help by an unusual alliance of gunmen and circus performers. (Italy)

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintock’s ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen O’Hara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Fort Yuma
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: The Hound Of The Baskervilles (1959)
programme.desc: A hellish hound feeds upon the flesh of the heirs of Baskerville Hall. But before this beast can sink its teeth into the newest lord, it must pit its vicious fangs against the searing intellect of Sherlock Holmes (Peter Cushing) and Dr. Watson.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: This follow up to THE HOUND OF THE BASKERVILLES returns Basil Rathbone as Sherlock Holmes and Nigel Bruce as Dr. John Watson, now attempting to foil their archenemy Professor Moriarty, who targets a family and plots the theft of the Crown Jewels.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes And The Secret Weapon
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson must protect a Swiss inventor of an advanced weapon

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Woman in Green (in Color)
programme.desc: Four women are brutally murdered, and Scotland Yard thinks it is the random work of a madman. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes Terror By Night (in color)
programme.desc: A murder mystery set on a speeding train, Holmes guards the transport of the 400-carat diamond. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Prelude to Murder (in Color)
programme.desc: A trio of music boxes contains the hidden secret to riches, and a group of criminals will kill for them. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Nominated for seven Academy Awards,® including Best Picture, and winner of two (1953, Best Art Direction-Set Decoration and Best Costume Design), this stunning biography of artist Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec is flawlessly directed by John Huston.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: After tipping his hat instead of saluting female Captain "Iron Pants" Martin, Gomer is assigned special detail in her office to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: After being bawled out by Sgt. Carter for not working hard enough Gomer decides not accept his pay for that week which causes all sorts of troubles for Sgt. Carter.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Sergeant Carter tries to make Gomer dislike him before graduation, feeling that he hasn't done his job correctly if he isn't hated by ALL the recruits.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The Hooterville Chamber of Commerce attempts to attract a Hollywood film studio to shoot a movie in town. And when a rumor spreads that a famous actor is arriving, the townsfolk are all abuzz as they prepare for their close-up, Mr. DeMille!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Fed up with the house being in dire need of repair, Lisa demands that Oliver arrange to have the house redone or she's moving back to New York. Oliver agrees, but is delayed when Mr. Haney claims that their farmhouse is a historic monument.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Everything is topsy-turvy and henhouse hijinks ensue when one of the Douglas' hens is found to be laying square eggs! News of this kind gets around quickly, and the townsfolk all get in on the race to capitalize on the impressive novelty.

programme.title: Green Acres

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A murder investigation in Florida crosses jurisdictions from New York and Jamaica. The police rely on cell phone mapping, wiretapping and a host of forensic evidence to link a suspect to a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Genell Plude is found dead in her bathroom, the scene points to suicide. But a coroner's inquest and a unique application of forensic science give investigators a different explanation for her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1997, Kelly Eckart's car was found, with her belongings still in it, after she worked a late shift in Franklin, Indiana. Days later, her body was found in an isolated ravine.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1985, Julie Estes was kidnapped from the Southside convenience store where she worked. Her body was found the next day, but the killing went unsolved until 2003.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mysterious computer crash pushed a thriving manufacturing company to the brink of collapse, jeopardizing hundreds of jobs. Forensic investigators had to determine if the crash was the result of a computer defect, human error, or sabotage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Faced with three homicides that appear to be professional executions, investigators on both sides of the Atlantic must find a common thread between the victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Derrick Duehren returned to find his Oregon home burned to the ground. His wife's charred remains were later found in the rubble. Investigators set out to determine if it was an unfortunate accident or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tracey Frame, 35, was convicted of killing David Nixon in April 2002 after he planned to end their relationship.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was supposed to be a routine motorcade for the Queen of England. But on the way to Yosemite National Park, a car carrying three Secret Service agents collided with a car driven by a deputy from the local sheriff's office.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman is killed instantly when a bomb explodes in her home. The device is so powerful that it embedded shrapnel in houses across the street. The bomber had not only knowledge and skill, but also a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A millionaire and his family were executed in their own home. For three years, the murders went unsolved. Finally, a 30-year-old box of ammunition and some fluorescent fibers revealed the ultimate betrayal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A surgeon is stabbed to death and the most likely suspect is seen in a restaurant at the time of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the Amtrak Railroad experienced the deadliest train crash in United States history when the Sunset Limited derailed while crossing Alabama's Big Bayou Canot bridge. 47 passengers and crew were killed; scores more were injured.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tries to incinerate everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently creates new forensic evidence. Detectives employ a technique never before used in a criminal investigation to bring it to light.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was one of the most brazen crimes of the 20th century. Adolph Coors III, chairman of the Coors Brewing Company, was kidnapped and held for ransom. The crime prompted one of the most intense manhunts in United States history.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: At the scene of a vicious murder, the killer went to a great deal of effort to wipe away his fingerprints and obscure his shoe impressions left when he tracked blood trails on the floor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities track a kidnapper who let his victim write a last will and informed the family of her murder. A phone number written on a previous page left a lasting impression, which helped to convict.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fire erupts in Kings Cross Station in London, killing 31 people and injuring dozens more. Investigators pinpoint the cause of the fire, but it takes state-of-the-art technology and fluid dynamics experts to explain why it became a deadly inferno.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, Brian and Beverly Mauck were found dead in their Graham, Washington home. Using a bloody palm print and shoe prints at the scene, investigators focus their attention on Daniel Tavares, who had previously inked a tattoo on Brian's back.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On May 12, 1994, Crystal Perry was viciously murdered in her home in Bridgton, Maine. Michael Hutchinson, 32, was later found guilty in the slaying.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Rachael Mullenix, 19, was convicted of stabbing her mother, Barbara Mullenix, in 2006. She allegedly packed her mother's bloodied corpse in a cardboard box before dumping it in California's Newport Bay.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On May 20, 2001, Carrie Nelson was beaten to death while working alone in a park office. The case went unsolved for six years. Finally, police found a match with DNA samples gathered from the crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Foul play is suspected when Fort Worth factory worker Glenda Furch disappears after completing her shift.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police get a clue about a couple who disappeared on Memorial Day weekend during an in-progress robbery. The evidence found solves a brutal crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In this episode, the decade-old murder of a young Texas housewife is investigated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, Palm Beach waitress Denise O'Neill is abducted and murdered. Her neighbor Luis Caballero arouses suspicions by behaving oddly toward TV crews covering the crime.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín tiene éxito con un nuevo método de protesta, mientras El Noruego y Jony dan sus primeros pasos en la "cossa nostra"

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia abre un grupo de WhatsApp para estar más conectados pero este se sale de control, mientras que Peluzín aprrovecha una noticia de un asesinato para sacarle dinero a Pitipú.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El calentamiento global trae consigo una mueva amenaza para la ciudad, mientras que Irma y Peluzín emprenden en un nuevo negocio, reclutando a varios amigos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego milagrosamente logra que le den un crédito bancario, mientras que Peluzín se aprovecha de una muerte reciente dentro del edificio para su beneficio económico.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego emprende en un nuevo negocio con pulgas, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan son tomados como rehenes por unos crimínales en un asalto al banco.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan y Gaspar buscan darle una lección al Abuelo en en Día del Padre, mientras que el Noruego se siente que no es valorado por Olaf y junto con Peluzín deciden tomar cartas en el asunto.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa un con Genio quien le conceda varios deseos, mientras que el Noruego decide lanzarle una fiesta sorpresa de cumpleaños a Olaf para que recupere su infancia perdida.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La compañía donde trabaja Gaspar atraviesa un recorte de personal pero el es de los pocos afortunados que se salva y es mandado a una capacitación a Estados Unidos, mientras que Peluzín toma el papel de Gaspar en México.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar atraviesa una crisis en su periodo de entrenamiento en Estados Unidos, mientras que el resto de la familia decide alcanzar a Gaspar

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se enamora de la estatua de cera de Ivanka Trump y toda la familia decide hacer un viaje y atravesar todo el país en auto hasta Nueva York.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide ir a NY a conocer a la verdadera Ivanka pero en el camino el grupo se separa de el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego sigue con su plan de casarse con la Ivanka de cera, mientras que el Abuelo y Peluzín afianzan su relación después de su gran viaje

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La familia va a Washington a pedir la mano de Ivanka con un resultado inesperado, mientras que Johnny busca deshacer la relación enfermiza entre el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe la sorpresa que después de una muchos años de crímenes su papá le deja un jugoso botín como herencia, mientras que Jonathan y Ortega buscan a un adulto que los lleve a la premier de la película del momento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se muda a un lujoso departamento y se dedica a buscar a un nuevo roommate, mientras que El Abuelo y Jonathan se pelean por quedarse con el cuarto una vez que el Noruego dejo el departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan es admitido a una reconocida escuela privada y Gaspar al no poder cubrir los gastos decide aventurarse con Peluzín en unos negocios turbios, mientras el Noruego busca consejos por parte de su familia porque no esta contento.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus divertidas aventuras. Desde paseos en camión hasta misterios con calcetines, zapatos apestosos, magia con helados, rugidos de dinosaurios, la hora de dormir y los superpoderes de mamá: ¡un día de diversión e imaginación!

programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en una emocionante aventura de aprendizaje y exploración. Desde descubrir sabores hasta dominar movimientos de karate, cada aventura está llena de risas, descubrimientos y valiosas lecciones que inspiran la curiosidad.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en las encantadoras melodías que inspiran dulces sueños y sonrisas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a Little Angel para un día de diversión! Desde cantar con globos hasta imitar sonidos de animales, canciones infantiles, partes del cuerpo, citas con el abuelo, sueños de dinosaurios y confiar en el médico, ¡es un día de risas y aprendizaje!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Acompaña a los Little Angels en un día lleno de aventuras! Desde armar un puesto de limonadas hasta convertirse en princesas, explorar con la araña Itsy Bitsy y disfrutar de fiestas en pijama, ¡cada momento es mágico!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels en un día lleno de diversión, aprendizaje y emoción. Desde la rutina matutina hasta el recreo en la escuela, pasando por el cuidado de los hermanitos y canciones deportivas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Prepárate para un armonioso viaje con los Little Angels mientras se sumergen en el mundo de las emociones. Con una melodía pegadiza y un poco de magia, convierten las lágrimas en sonrisas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en sus tiernos viajes. Desde el amor entre hermanos hasta la perseverancia, pasando por la alegría de los cumpleaños, la diversión en el salón y la salud, ¡todo un tesoro de lecciones envueltas en amor y risas!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en un día lleno de emoción y asombro. Desde aprender el baile de Baby Shark hasta explorar la magia de mezclar colores, jugar y descubrir sorpresas, ¡es un viaje de diversión y descubrimiento que te dejará sonriendo!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Acompaña a Little Angel en una aventura mágica! Desde momentos tranquilos hasta monos juguetones, cuentos de hadas, búsquedas de huevos de Pascua, parques de diversiones, cumpleaños y paciencia, ¡es un día de maravillas y diversión!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a Little Angel para divertirte al aire libre! Desde payasadas en el patio hasta patinaje, familias de dedos, seguridad en la cama, concientización sobre accidentes y faltar a clase, ¡un día de juegos y seguridad!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Sumérgete en un día lleno de emociones con Little Angel! Desde campamentos y aventuras piratas hasta visitas al zoológico, competencias de castillos de arena, aventuras heladas y la alegría navideña, ¡cada aventura es un tesoro de alegría y risas!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en una actividad familiar. Jugarán y crearán recuerdos para toda la vida.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en la diversión acuática, embarcados en aventuras que los harán chapotear.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en un divertido viaje lleno de chapuzones sobre la natación segura.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)

programme.title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About...
programme.desc: Sally keeps getting found when they play Hide and Seek. Cat takes them to Tagaloo to meet a great seeker.

programme.title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About...

programme.title: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends
programme.desc: Willow brings home a mushroom, and a full invasion follows. / A windstorm injures Berry, the lifeguard at Taddy Puddle.

programme.title: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends
programme.desc: Ted and Ned come up with a new plan to get food by selling itchy ivy leaves as magic carpets. / Bounce has lost his smile, his friend tries to find it for him.

programme.title: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends

programme.title: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends
programme.desc: Spiderus tries to sing to his unhatched babies and thinks he hears them singing back. / Spiderus is not the perfect parent he thought he was.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Jett flies to Battambang, Cambodia, to deliver a duck whistle to a girl named Solyna so she can help her parents herd their ducks into a truck; when the ducks escape, Sky scrambles Paul's Police Patrol to help track down the waddling wildlife.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: When a girl named Louisa in Germany goes to visit her favorite amusement park, she's sad to learn that it is being closed forever; the Super Wings work to give the park a makeover and a whole new lease on life.

programme.title: Olivia Newton John: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Olivia Newton-John amassed three Grammys and eight American Music Awards.

programme.title: Mighty Good: The Beatles
programme.desc: No musical group has had as profound an impact on pop music as The Beatles. Tony Palmer’s groundbreaking documentary gives us an intimate look at one of the most influential groups in musical history.

programme.title: Living on Soul
programme.desc: Filmed during their three-night, sold-out residency at the historic Apollo Theater, this hybrid docu-concert film features the late great Sharon Jones, Charles Bradley and the rest of the Grammy-nominated Daptone Records family.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti: A Classic Album Under Review
programme.desc: This DVD is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Clive Davis
programme.desc: Larry sits down with Grammy award winning record producer and music executive, Clive Davis, to talk about the surprising personal revelations in his new book, the rise and fall of Whitney Houston, and his fallout with Kelly Clarkson.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Tim McGraw
programme.desc: Larry chats with country music star, Tim McGraw, at the Venetian Hotel in Las Vegas. McGraw opens up about working with his wife, Faith Hill, raising teenage daughters, and making peace with his late father.

programme.title: Larry King Now: The Backstreet Boys
programme.desc: Larry sits down with the Backstreet Boys and talks about their new album, tour, and celebrating 20 years as a group. And, Larry King seeks a definition for the term boy band, a label the group never fully embraced

programme.title: Larry King Now: Celine Dion
programme.desc: Larry chats with pop music icon, Celine Dion, about her return to the spotlight, her new album, and how she is balancing motherhood and fame.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Jason Derulo
programme.desc: Jason Derulo is back! The singer goes in depth with Larry about his first album since severely breaking his neck, dating another famous singer, and what he thinks of his current musical competition.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Garth Brooks
programme.desc: It’s Garth Brooks! Country music’s best-selling artist sounds off on his admiration for Taylor Swift, his gripe with the modern music industry, and why taking time off to be with family was a great decision.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Ice Cube
programme.desc: Larry sits down with rapper turned actor and producer, Ice Cube, to talk about his new movie with Kevin Hart, his early years with seminal rap group NWA, and his thoughts on rap music today.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Akon
programme.desc: Music mogul and actor Akon reflects on his friendship with Michael Jackson, his work to bring electricity to Africa, and why he thinks monogamy is misguided. Plus, how Akon made Lady Gaga a superstar.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Willie Nelson
programme.desc: Country music megastar Willie Nelson invites Larry aboard his tour bus for an open conversation about life as an octogenarian, his iconic career, the legalization of marijuana, and the 2016 presidential race.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Common
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Larry welcomes a co-host to his den: NBA vet and style icon Baron Davis. The pair chat with Common about the importance of his tenth album, how his daughter influences his music, and his friendship with the late Maya Angelou.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Jason Mraz
programme.desc: Fresh off the release of his fifth studio album Yes!, Jason Mraz counters critics who accuse him of being too positive and explains why his heart will always be in coffee shops. Plus, Jason on his double life as an avocado farmer.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Flea
programme.desc: The Red Hot Chili Peppers' Flea sits down with Larry to talk about his new film 'Low Down' and why it's so near to his heart. Plus, they chat RHCP and Flea's upcoming memoir.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Will.i.am
programme.desc: Black Eyed Peas' co-creator will.i.am talks with Larry King about his exciting new smart watch venture, what he thinks about Taylor Swift, and why he's "disappointed" in President Obama.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Big Sean
programme.desc: From New York City, rapper Big Sean joins Larry King for a well-rounded discussion about his new album Dark Sky Paradise, learning from boss and mentor Kanye West, and recording with girlfriend Ariana Grande.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: CatDog

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy’s gang is running low on supplies, so they stop at Little Garden to find something to eat. Unfortunately for them, it might end up the other way around.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp and Luffy are fascinated by the endless battle waged between Dorry and Broggy; however, fascination turns to outrage when Monkey catches a whiff of treachery.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy struggles to free himself, his friends fall into the hands of Baroque Works. Though the odds are against them, the Straw Hats will never give up!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami, Zorro, and the Princess are in danger of becoming exhibits in a fiendish artist’s collection, and only Luffy can save them. But he’s busy having a cup of tea.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With his friends about to be permanently entombed in wax, Usopp is provided with the perfect opportunity to be brave and make his father proud.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After narrowly avoiding death, Luffy’s crew and the Princess set sail for Alabasta, but something large and dangerous looms in their path.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami comes down with a terrible fever and the Straw Hats don’t know what to do. Looks like the Grand Line might claim another victim.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats continue their quest to find a doctor for Nami. Along the way, they deal with a ravenous invader and get a chilly reception from local islanders.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Sanji make a bold trek up a snow-covered mountain in search of a witch who might hold the key to curing Nami.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ferocious, giant, snow rabbits slow Luffy and Sanji’s progress up the mountain. Meanwhile, the former king Wapol returns to the town he abandoned.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami hovers near death while Luffy and Sanji fend off the abominable rabbits. Back at the village, Dalton leads a revolt against the dastardly Wapol.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: An unlikely source acts as a roadblock to give Luffy some climbing room, and Zorro emerges from a snow bank cold, cranky, and ready to rumble

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After a long journey up the mountain, Nami finally receives much-needed medical attention, but Sanji and Luffy are more interested in eating the doctor!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ship’s doctor.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy unleashes the full force of his Gum Gum furry on Wapol, and Chopper is amazed by the rubberman’s fierce devotion to the pirate flag.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After an explosive battle with Wapol, Luffy begins the tiring process of convincing Chopper to join his pirate gang.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding. They find her, but one question remains: is it actually her?

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew is separated: Dylan, Beka, and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a new weapon being developed on a planet that is distrustful of AI; Harper, Tyr, and Rev struggle for survival when the Maru crashes into the ocean.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: Lust and greed are at the core of the case of a wife and mother who is found dead in her pool; investigators are quick to uncover a web of affairs, lies and fraud that lead them to her killer.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is found dead in a hotel stairwell and detectives quickly uncover that she had a secret life that may have led to her demise.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a police officer goes missing, it becomes apparent he is the victim of a jealous wrath.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: Three members of a wealthy family are gunned down in their own home; with little evidence to go on, investigators embark on a multi-year surveillance operation to see if they can prove their instincts are correct.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A beloved entrepreneur is murdered in his office; a secret double life is quickly revealed, and despite mountains of suspicion, lies and motives, his killer is not who one would assume.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A man is found dead in the shower, and police have only two suspects, but to figure out who killed him and why, is not as cut and dry as it may seem.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A teenage girl is found beaten to death at the neighborhood pool, launching her father on a mission to catch her killer that ultimately changes crime fighting forever.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A brutal attack leaves witness to a murder; but when the police find the killer, it turns out the intended victim, and the motive, were not what anyone imagined.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a prominent attorney is found savagely stabbed to death in her office, investigators find themselves with a long list of suspects from violent felons to lesbian love triangles; in the end, they find a killer as cold as they come.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: What originally looks like a heart attack turns out to be a calculated execution; soon, detectives unravel a murder plot that hits a little too close to home.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: After a woman is found shot dead, with her 9-month-old daughter in the next room, detectives uncover a web of late-night encounters, secret lovers and seething jealousy.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A woman is found stabbed to death in her apartment; with a long list of admirers, investigators uncover secret obsessions leading to a sadistic killer suspected by no one.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is strangled to death in the middle of a Hawaiian paradise; investigators quickly focus in on two suspects, but nothing comes easy as they spend more than a decade striving to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A retired couple are found beaten to death in their country club estate, but detectives soon discover that what happens in Vegas doesn't always stay there as they hunt down this monstrous killer.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A young woman is stabbed to death and suspects include a warlock and a rumored Wiccan lover; the case goes unsolved for years, until a triple homicide leads investigators to a dark obsession that costs four people their lives.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A local beauty queen is found dead in a lake; as her small town grieves, law enforcement finds itself on a 20-plus year investigation that leads to a killer who was hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When lovers turn on each other, or marriages fail, some ruthless spouses find a grisly way to gain an uncontested divorce – with no paperwork. When murder tears lovers apart, forensic science must put piece together the mystery to catch the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In San Diego, California, a killer has left behind pieces of evidence. Detectives must sort through these small clues to prove murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: “To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth”.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: An abandoned car outside Philadelphia brings heartbreak to a family and terror to a community. A young woman is dead, the killer gone. But the marks of his passage remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Formed in the 1830s to protect settlers against Indian attack, the Rangers became part of the Texas Highway Patrol in 1935. Their role has continued to evolve to keep up with changing times; today it includes sophisticated forensics labs.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The solution to the most heinous crimes often hinge on the smallest of clues. Investigators must have their eyes trained to find the full story of a murder written in a single scrap of evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: It is difficult to convict a murderer if the body can't be found. But forensic science is finding ways to do it. Devious killers can think up many was to dispose of their victim's remains, but they are often no matches for investigators.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: New Forensic Techniques used to Solve Old Cases: Advancement in science and technology are encouraging people to revisit the past in hopes of answering questions that have remained unanswered, and solving crimes that seemed unsolvable.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At the scene of a murder, sometimes the victim provides the only clues to their killer. Forensic anthropologists use skeletal remains to decipher the clues written in the bones.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes when a death seems to be accidental or the result of a tragic accident, it is up to forensic scientists to reveal the deception lying just below the surface.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather Jr vs Justin Juuko
programme.desc: On May 22nd, 1999 Floyd Mayweather fought Justin Juuko at the Mandalay Bay Resort & Casino in Las Vegas for the WBC World Super featherweight title with the bout ending in round nine resulting in a victory for Mayweather

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Arturo Gatti
programme.desc: On June 25th, 2005 Floyd Mayweather fought Arturo Gatti at the Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City for the WBC World Super Lightweight title with Gatti down in round 1 the fight ended in a victory for Mayweather.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Carlos Alberto Ramon Rios
programme.desc: On February 17th, 1999, Floyd Mayweather fought Carlos Rios for the WBC Super Featherweight Title in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Rios was a tough opponent for Mayweather, but Mayweather prevailed and showed out in front of his hometown, winning by UD.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Diego Corrales
programme.desc: On January 20th, 2001 Floyd Mayweather faced Diego Corrales in a battle for the WBC World super feather weight titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas ending in a technical knockout victory for Mayweather.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Jose Luis Castillo 1
programme.desc: On April 20th, 2002 Floyd Mayweather fought Jose Luis Castillo for the first time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for WBC World lightweight titles in a bout that went 12 rounds ending in a victory for Mayweather.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs DeMarcus Corley
programme.desc: On February 26th, 2005 Miguel Cotto fought DeMarcus Corley for the WBO World Super Lightweight title at the Coliseo Ruben Rodriguez in Bayamon with Corley going down twice in the 5th round securing the technical knockout victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Hector Arroyo
programme.desc: On January 9th, 1998, Floyd Mayweather fought Hector Arroyo in a featherweight bout in Biloxi, Mississippi. A young Mayweather hungry for a title shot came out quick against Arroyo, stopping him in the fifth round of the fight.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Larry O'Shields
programme.desc: On June 14th, 1997, Floyd Mayweather fought Larry O'Shields in a lightweight bout at the Alamodome in San Antonio, Texas. A young Mayweather showed his impressive speed and agility, earning a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Manny Pacquiao
programme.desc: On May 2nd, 2015, Floyd Mayweather fought Manny Pacquiao in what was labeled as the "Fight of the Century." Floyd Mayweather emerged victorious via a unanimous decision, showcasing his exceptional defensive skills against Pacquiao's aggressive style.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Zab Judah
programme.desc: On April 8th, 2006, Floyd Mayweather fought Zab Judah for the IBF and IBO Welterweight Titles at Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas. In a fight with a dramatic melee in round 10, Mayweather cruised in the later rounds to win by unanimous decision.

programme.title: Freddie Roach vs Joe Ruelaz
programme.desc: On August 9th, 1984, Freddie Roach fought Joe Ruelaz in a super featherweight bout in Las Vegas. The more experienced Roach made easy work of Ruelaz, stopping him in the fourth round.

programme.title: Freddie Roach vs Mario Chavez
programme.desc: On May 28th, 1981 Freddie Roach faced Mario Chavez at the Hacienda Hotel in Las Vegas resulting in a unanimous decision win for Roach.

programme.title: Genaro Hernandez vs Azumah Nelson
programme.desc: On March 22nd, 1997, Genaro Hernandez fought Azumah Nelson for the World Super Featherweight Championship at the Memorial Coliseum in Corpus Christi. Hernandez looked like the more confident fighter, earning a close split decision victory.

programme.title: George Foreman vs Adilson Rodrigues
programme.desc: On June 16th, 1990 George Foreman fought Adilson Rodrigues at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas resulting in a victory for Foreman in round two by technical knockout.

programme.title: George Foreman vs Alex Stewart
programme.desc: On April 11th, 1992 George Foreman faced Alex Stewart at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas ending in a majority decision victory for Foreman.

programme.title: George Foreman vs Gerry Cooney
programme.desc: On January 15th, 1990 George Foreman and Gerry Cooney fought at the Reno-Sparks Convention Center in Reno, Las Vegas ending in a majority decision victory for Foreman.

programme.title: George Kambosos vs Devin Haney 1
programme.desc: On June 5th, 2022 George Kambosos and Devin Haney fought for the first time at Marvel Stadium in Melboure for the IBF, WBA, WBC & WBO World lightweight titles resulting in a victory for Devin Haney.

programme.title: Hector Camacho vs Sugar Ray Leonard
programme.desc: On January 3rd, 1997 Hector Camacho faced Sugar Ray Leonard at the Convention Center in Atlantic City battling for IBC Middleweight title the bout ended after five rounds resulting in a victory for Leonard by technical knockout.

programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. Attempting to even the odds against the Stunticons, the Autobots create the Aerialbots to join in the battle against Megatron, who plans to use Vector Sigma to turn the Earth into a metal planet like Cybertron!
